content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### First Furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (0.0, 0.0)) with fuel inventory containing coal and a source of iron ore, currently producing iron plates.

### Second Furnace at position (2, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (2.0, 0.0)) with fuel inventory containing coal, but currently has no ingredients to smelt.

### Third Furnace at position (4, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (4.0, 0.0)) with fuel inventory containing coal, but currently has no ingredients to smelt and its fuel source is full.

### Fourth Furnace at position (6, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (6.0, 0.0)) with fuel inventory containing coal, but currently has no ingredients to smelt.

### Wooden Chest at position (8.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest (position (8.5, 0.5)) with an empty inventory.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into the first furnace
- Ensure the furnace has available inventory space before attempting to insert items. The furnace at position (0, 0) had a full inventory when trying to insert coal.

### Errors when attempting to insert items without sufficient inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into any entity. There were multiple instances where the agent attempted to insert coal or iron ore without having them available.

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient resources
- Always check your inventory before crafting to ensure you have enough materials. The agent frequently encountered errors stating there were not enough iron plates to craft iron gear wheels.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items. The agent should ensure proximity to the furnace when attempting to extract items.
